metadata.Title: CVE-2018-13250 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: libming 0.4.8 has a NULL pointer dereference in the getString function of the decompile.c file, related to decompileSTRINGCONCAT. Remote attackers could leverage this vulnerability to cause a denial of service via a crafted swf file.

criterions.comment: ming: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
